meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with funnel-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The agapanthus in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted an agapanthus in my backyard for its lovely flowers.
meanings.sent3: The agapanthus decided to wear a tiny hat made of petals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an agapanthus, bright and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The agapanthus swayed gently in the breeze, a floral dance of nature.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the agapanthus belongs.
meanings.sent1: Many gardeners admire the agapanthus genus for its variety.
meanings.sent2: The agapanthus genus includes different species with unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The agapanthus genus held a family reunion for all its plant relatives.
meanings.sent4: In the botanical world, the agapanthus genus reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: Each member of the agapanthus genus brings its own beauty to the garden.
